Song.Title: You Are My Sunshine
Song.Lyrics:
You are my sunshine.
My only sunshine.
You make me happy
When skies are grey.
You'll never know, dear
How much I love you
Please don't take my sunshine away

The other night, dear,
As I lay sleeping
I dreamt I held you in my arms.
When I awoke, dear,
I was misteken
And I hung my head and cried.
